diffraction package¶

diffraction.cif module¶

Docstring for the module

exception diffraction.cif.CIFParseError¶

Bases: Exception

Exception raised for all parse errors due to incorrect syntax.

class diffraction.cif.CIFParser(filepath)¶

Bases: object

Class for parsing CIF files and exporting data in JSON style format

The CIF file is parsed and data items are extracted for each data block. Data is stored in a list of DataBlock objects. This can then be saved to a .json file.

Before parsing the CIF file is checked for syntax errors and if one is found then a CIFParseError is raised

raw_data¶

str

A string of the raw data from the file of which the comments and blank lines are stripped out

data_blocks¶

list[DataBlock]

A list of data blocks

Examples

>>> p = CIFParser("path/to/cif_file.cif")
>>> p.parse()
>>> p.save("path/to/json_file.cif")
parse()¶
save(filepath)¶

Save data in JSON format with data items sorted alphabetically by name.

Parameters:filepath (str) – target filepath for json file
